summary: I recolored the light chitin armor
descriptionHtml:
Mostly this is up because I was unable to actually find any mods changing the appearance of the chitin light armor. Maybe I wasn't looking in the right place, I dunno. The chitin armor to me looked really ugly, which sucked cause Teldryn Sero is by far my favorite follower. So I recolored the armor.

This is in no way perfect. It was the best I could manage and better then it was before. Well in my opinion anyways. I know this isn't the most popular armor by a long shot but like I said its just here cause there's not much else so whatever.

To install just download and put it in the appropriate spot in the skyrim data folder.

Dragonborn required for obvious reasons.
author: KidneyFail
